name: Nextlabs Encrypted Data File
summary: An NXL file is an encrypted data file created by SkyDRM, a program for protecting sensitive information from unauthorized access. It contains a file, such as a .PDF , .JPEG , or .MP4 file, that is secured with SkyDRM encryption. NXL files can be configured to be accessed, edited, read, shared, and printed by specific people.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
